mapper.insert: insert into project (pid, paccountName, pidentify, paccountTel, ploc, pimage, pname, pcontent, pdate, ptargetMoney, praiseDays, ppresentMoney, ptags, pdescripTitle, pdescripCont, prepayType, prepayTitle, prepayCont, pcid, uid) values (#{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paccountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pidentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paccounttel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ploc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptargetmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{praisedays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ppresentmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ptags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdescriptitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdescripcont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prepaytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prepaytitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prepaycont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update project set paccountName = #{paccountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pidentify = #{pidentify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paccountTel = #{paccounttel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ploc = #{ploc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pimage = #{pimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcontent = #{pcontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdate = #{pdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ptargetMoney = #{ptargetmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, praiseDays = #{praisedays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ppresentMoney = #{ppresentmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ptags = #{ptags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdescripTitle = #{pdescriptitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdescripCont = #{pdescripcont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prepayType = #{prepaytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prepayTitle = #{prepaytitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prepayCont = #{prepaycont,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcid = #{pcid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select pid, paccountName, pidentify, paccountTel, ploc, pimage, pname, pcontent, pdate, ptargetMoney, praiseDays, ppresentMoney, ptags, pdescripTitle, pdescripCont, prepayType, prepayTitle, prepayCont, pcid, uid from project where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select pid, paccountName, pidentify, paccountTel, ploc, pimage, pname, pcontent, pdate, ptargetMoney, praiseDays, ppresentMoney, ptags, pdescripTitle, pdescripCont, prepayType, prepayTitle, prepayCont, pcid, uid from project
